text.text_translated: Asteroids are small rocks in space. NASA can find the other middle-sized asteroids. But they can only do this if they get money. They need money to build a 0.5-metre space telescope called NEOCam. This telescope will use infrared light. Infrared light is a special light. People cannot see it. If NASA gets the money, it will take about ten years. After they find the asteroids, a team has a job. They must think about how to protect our planet. They need to stop dangerous asteroids from hitting it.
